# PHS 7045

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis 
#| warning: false

# List of pages to be rendered
fns <- read.csv("pages.csv")

# Moving the data
for (i in 1:nrow(fns)) {

    # Getting the files
    if (file.exists(fns$copy[i]))
        file.copy(
            from = fns$copy[i],
            to   = dirname(fns$urlpath[i]),
            recursive = TRUE
            )

    file.copy(from = fns$path[i], to = fns$urlpath[i])
    cat(sprintf("-  %s ([link](%s))\n\n", fns$name[i], fns$urlpath[i]))

}
```
